title: Lost and Found
description: The land of Orcion is in crisis, Dragons, monstrous beasts with strange magic are beginning to attack the people, and the Noble Clans don't know what to do. In the midst of all of this rising chaos, Brenna is sent to catch a murderer in the small town of Caedenshire she has no idea that it will lead to the biggest meeting of her life, she simply could not imagine that this strange young man who blasted into her life (literally) would reunite her with the brother she lost and show her the greatest evil she could possibly imagine!
author: Amulous Fable
